metadata.title: CVE-2016-9588 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
arch/x86/kvm/vmx.c in the Linux kernel through 4.9 mismanages the #BP and#OF exceptions, which allows guest OS users to cause a denial of service(guest OS crash) by declining to handle an exception thrown by an L2 guest.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9588` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

No subscription required
